data.text: @healthgovau Also 28 more deaths today from Vic. Vaccines are great so grateful for the scientists who did the work but seriously why can’t we help, just a little bit by continuing to wear masks ? Low cost NPI @VictorianCHO @DanielAndrewsMP. It is a pandemic the next variant is when not if
@healthgovau Second if we give out health warnings on Japanese encephalitis from mossies why not encourage masks for protection from long covid.

@healthgovau Still less than 52% of children 5-11 single vaccinated. Emerging evidence of waning vaccines efficacy for this age group. But hey long covid may not hit your child. It’s a bit of a lottery. Are Australian parents gambling with their children long term health ? Australian gov is
